name: DuckTales 2
summary: DuckTales 2 is a platform video game developed by Make Software published by Capcom and is a sequel to the original DuckTales based on the Disney animated series of the same name. Released on the Nintendo Entertainment System in early 1993, the title was ported to the Game Boy handheld system in Japan and North America at the end of the year.
info:
